Average and scale rows in a data.frame

Source: R/reducers.R
scaled_mean.Rd

scaled_mean() calculates scaled row means for a dataframe.

scaled_mean(.x, method = c("r", "c"))

Arguments

.x

a data.frame
method

The method source: both the pure R and C++ versions are efficient

Value

a numeric vector

Examples

library(dplyr)
iris %>%
  select_if(is.numeric) %>%
  scaled_mean()
#>   [1] -1.17102394 -1.39511272 -1.42712540 -1.42712540 -1.17102394 -0.78687174
